message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $850,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value your interest, $850,000 doesn't quite meet my expectations.  I'm willing to come down to $875,000. This is a fair compromise that should be beneficial for both of us.  Let me know if you're open to this.

I understand your position, Alice. I'm glad we're able to continue discussing this. Given my financial situation, I can only agree to $860,000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable compromise that respects both our interests.
